metadata.title: Shiori Chan
metadata.description: Shiori Chan is a bookmark manager that allows you to save and organize your bookmarks.

Signup.subtitle: Create your account
Signup.name: Name
Signup.email_info_popover: Drop any email here. We won't send you jack. Fake emails welcome (just don't forget it, genius).

AppShell.sign_out_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

BookmarkForm.metadata_fetch_failed_message: Could not fetch metadata from URL. You can still enter details manually.
BookmarkForm.description_placeholder_with_suggestions: Enter description or select from suggestions above

EditBookmarkModal.success_message: Your bookmark has been updated successfully.
EditBookmarkModal.error_message: An error occurred while updating the bookmark. Please try again.

NewBookmarkModal.success_message: Your bookmark has been created successfully.
NewBookmarkModal.error_message: An error occurred while creating the bookmark. Please try again.

EditCollectionModal.success_message: Your collection has been updated successfully.
EditCollectionModal.error_message: An error occurred while updating the collection. Please try again.

NewCollectionModal.success_message: Your collection has been created successfully.
NewCollectionModal.error_message: An error occurred while creating the collection. Please try again.

Settings_General.title: General
Settings_General.language_description: Select your preferred language for the application

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Manage your preferences and configure your application settings.

Settings_Layout.title: Layout
Settings_Layout.description: Customize how your content is displayed and organized.
Settings_Layout.layout_mode_description: Choose how your bookmarks are displayed
Settings_Layout.launcher_collection_opacity_description: Adjust the opacity of collection backgrounds
Settings_Layout.launcher_collection_blur_description: Adjust the blur effect on collection backgrounds
Settings_Layout.launcher_show_empty_uncollected_descript: Display the uncollected section even when empty
Settings_Layout.list_coming_soon: Configuration options for list layout are coming soon!
Settings_Layout.grid_coming_soon: Configuration options for grid layout are coming soon!

Settings_Wallpaper.title: Wallpapers
Settings_Wallpaper.description: Upload background images for your home page. You can have up to {max} wallpapers and customize display settings for each.
Settings_Wallpaper.max_limit_reached: Maximum limit reached. Delete a wallpaper to upload a new one.
Settings_Wallpaper.empty_state_message: No wallpapers uploaded yet. Upload your first wallpaper to get started!

Layout_Launcher.delete_bookmark_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.
Layout_Launcher.empty_subtitle: Start by adding your first bookmark
Layout_Launcher.empty_import_alternative: Or import your bookmarks from a file
Layout_Launcher.delete_collection_message: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
Layout_Launcher.delete_collection_error_message: An error occurred while deleting the collection.
Layout_Launcher.delete_collection_error_message_retry: An error occurred while deleting the collection. Please try again.
